channel.title: Stopping syi
channel.description: This might be a noob question.. But ive had 3 syi in a day how can i stop them entering?

item.title: Stopping syi
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“skiller noob1, post:5, topic:236788”][quote author=Deamerrr link=topic=312572.msg2490537#msg2490537 date=1224096626]

[quote author=jc22493 link=topic=312572.msg2490458#msg2490458 date=1224089095]
You can make them illegal names, so they will be blocked.
[/quote]blocking Syipkpker or anything to do with that doesnt stop it, noobs with syipk can make name whatever they want
[/quote] Your truely stupid, aren’t you?[/quote]

Yes, he is.

Read full topic

item.title: Stopping syi
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Please, there should be 0 topics asking about SYI.
Removing thread per client (made very easy) stops syi and all nulls

Search next time.
